content: I'm excited to check out these recommendations. I've actually been reading a lot of books lately, and I just finished "The Hating Game" by Sally Thorne, which was a nice break from the dark thrillers I've been reading. But I'm always up for a good psychological thriller. Do you think any of these books would be available as audiobooks? I've been listening to audiobooks during my morning runs and it's been really convenient.
